title: The Drift Inn
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Historic pub and cafe. Has several vegan choices which are clearly marked. Note only one fryer in the kitchen that's also used for fish. Casual family-friendly atmosphere with a full bar and a small gift shop selling locally-made crafts and jewelry. Live music at night.
